sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Container, TextField, Select, MenuItem, Card, CardContent, CardMedia, Typography, Button, Box, Grid, Paper, Tabs, Tab, CircularProgress, // Add this } from '@mui/material'; const DESCRIPTION_PREVIEW_LENGTH = 150; const categories = [ 'Technology', 'Food & Beverage', 'Environmental', 'Healthcare', 'Finance', 'Retail', 'Education', 'Manufacturing', 'Energy', 'Transportation', ]; const [companiesData, setCompaniesData] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [allCompaniesLoaded, setAllCompaniesLoaded] = useState(false); const [offset, setOffset] = useState(0); const [limit, setLimit] = useState(10); const COMPANIES_PER_PAGE = 9; useEffect(() => { fetchCompanies(); window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, [searchTerm, filterCategory, filterSize, filterLocation]); function App() { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [filterCategory, setFilterCategory] = useState(''); const [filterSize, setFilterSize] = useState(''); const [filterLocation, setFilterLocation] = useState(''); const [selectedCompany, setSelectedCompany] = useState(null); const [page, setPage] = useState(1); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState(0); const filteredCompanies = companiesData.filter((company) => { const nameMatch = company.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()); let categoryMatch = true; let sizeMatch = true; let locationMatch = true; if (filterCategory) { categoryMatch = company.category === filterCategory; } if (filterSize) { sizeMatch = company.size === filterSize; } if (filterLocation) { locationMatch = company.location === filterLocation; } return nameMatch && categoryMatch && sizeMatch && locationMatch; }); const handleCompanyClick = (company) => { setSelectedCompany(company); }; const handleBack = () => { setSelectedCompany(null); }; const handleChangePage = (event, newPage) => { setPage(newPage); }; const handleTabChange = (event, newValue) => { setActiveTab(newValue); }; const startIndex = (page - 1) * COMPANIES_PER_PAGE; const endIndex = startIndex + COMPANIES_PER_PAGE; const companiesToDisplay = filteredCompanies.slice(startIndex, endIndex); if (selectedCompany) { return ( {/* Hero Section (Logo and Name) - Moved outside tabs */} {selectedCompany.name} Innovating for a Better Future {activeTab === 0 && ( <> About Us {selectedCompany.description} Key Features:
  • Cutting-edge solutions
  • Dedicated team
  • Sustainable practices
 {/* Key Information Section (Moved inside About Us tab) */} Key Information Category: {selectedCompany.category} Size: {selectedCompany.size} Founded: {selectedCompany.founded} Headquarters: {selectedCompany.headquarters} Location: {selectedCompany.location} Employees: {selectedCompany.employees} Mission: {selectedCompany.mission} Values: {(selectedCompany.values || []).join(', ')} {/* Financial Information Section (Moved inside About Us tab) */} Financial Highlights Revenue: ${selectedCompany.financialStatement.revenue} Profit: ${selectedCompany.financialStatement.profit} Assets: ${selectedCompany.financialStatement.assets} Liabilities: ${selectedCompany.financialStatement.liabilities} )} {/* ... (Careers, Investors, Assessment, Transformation Plan tabs) */} {activeTab === 2 && ( <> Investors Welcome to our investor relations page. Key Investor Highlights:
  • Annual Report 2023 - Download here
  • Financial Results Q4 2023 - View here
  • Investor Presentations - Access here
 Contact Investor Relations: investors@company.com )} {activeTab === 3 && ( <> Assessment Our company undergoes regular assessments to ensure continuous improvement. Key Assessment Findings:
  • Strong market position in the technology sector.
  • Opportunities for improvement in customer satisfaction.
  • Commitment to sustainability and environmental responsibility.
 Assessment Reports:
  • Sustainability Report - Download here
  • Customer Satisfaction Report - Download here
 )} {activeTab === 1 && ( // Portfolio Tab <> Portfolio Our portfolio showcases our diverse projects and achievements. Featured Projects:
  • Project A - View Details here
  • Project B - View Details here
  • Project C - View Details here
 Client Success Stories:
  • Client X - Read Story here
  • Client Y - Read Story here
 View our complete portfolio: here )} {activeTab === 4 && ( <> Transformation Plan Our strategic transformation plan is focused on innovation and growth, divided into clear phases. Planning In the planning phase, we conducted thorough market research, defined clear objectives, and established key performance indicators (KPIs). This phase involved:
  • Market analysis and competitive benchmarking
  • Strategic goal setting and resource allocation
  • Development of a detailed project roadmap
 Execution The execution phase focused on implementing the planned initiatives. This included:
  • Team formation and role assignments
  • Development of new technologies and systems
  • Pilot testing and iterative improvements
 Monitoring We continuously monitored progress against our KPIs and made necessary adjustments. This phase involved:
  • Regular progress meetings and status reports
  • Data analysis and performance tracking
  • Risk assessment and mitigation
 Release The release phase marked the successful completion and deployment of our transformation plan. This included:
  • Final testing and quality assurance
  • Rollout and user training
  • Post-implementation reviews and feedback collection
 Transformation Plan Document - Download here )} ); } return ( Company Directory setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} sx={{ mb: 1 }} /> {companiesToDisplay.map((company) => ( handleCompanyClick(company)} sx={{ cursor: 'pointer', height: '100%' }}> {company.name} Category: {company.category} Location: {company.location} Revenue: ${company.financialStatement.revenue} Description: {company.description.substring(0, DESCRIPTION_PREVIEW_LENGTH)}... ))} ); } export default App;
